entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
